channel.title: Vedanta on Guy James
channel.description: Recent content in Vedanta on Guy James

item.title: A Question?
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: Swift easy despair Tempt me to the edge A senseless swoon Black eyes point Back to the womb A narrative spent- The infant only has moments, No breeze of story Catches his sails. He twists in the winds of hazard, Careless, not free Because freedom is owned by its opposite As all things Extracted from the fabric Like time A conception laid bare Shown to be without foundation We fall
